scheme_name: Medical Camps (Allopathy and Indian systems of Medicine)
description: Through this scheme, senior citizens are provided free health checkups and free medicines.
benefits: Free Health Checkup and Free Medicines.
eligibility: The applicant should be 60 years or above in age.
The applicant should be a Native/Resident of the Union Territory of Puducherry for at least 5 years.
documents: Residence-cum-Nativity Certificate, issued by the competent authority.
